description:
As always, I try to balance the site with newbies and pros, straight guys and gay guys.
As many of you know, some of those straight or bi guys, end up deciding being with other men is how they now identify. Some viewers get tired of 'straight guys' in gay porn, but I think it is important to give them videos, let them explore and grow from their experiences. Often, it is fun to go on the journey with them.
The last couple videos have been straight guys exploring, so I knew I needed some professional gay guys who would just put their all into having sex with each other.
This week (and next week) I have pairings that are just off the charts in terms of energy and raw sex. Easton and Thompson are this week's ultimate duo, and you will not be disappointed. Next week's is just as awesome!
Of course, Easton has always brought pure passion to virtually every shoot, while Thompson has always matched his sex partners energy and has grown into being very comfortable and embraced his sexuality in full.
Putting these two guys together was a no brainer, and as I said, you won't be disappointed.
Enjoy!
tags: Sex Act - ATM Ass To Mouth
title: Easton & Thompson - RAW
